name: overgrow
effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its grass-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
short_effect: Strengthens grass moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.
